title: Book Review: ‘The Women of Rothschild,’ by Natalie Livingstone
description: A new biography by Natalie Livingstone focuses on several generations of the banking family’s wives and daughters, documenting their passions for politics, science and music, all abetted by wealth and social connections.
dc:creator: Miranda Seymour
media:credit: From left: Julia Margaret Cameron, Tony Evans/Getty Images, Philip Alexius de Laszlo
media:description: From left: Hannah de Rothschild (later Lady Rosebery); Miriam Rothschild; Rózsika Rothschild
